title: The Lorefiles
content: The Lorefiles directory is the largest section of the repository at 27M, containing the narrative memories and stories that define agent knowledge. These files transform technical information into mythological narratives - where bug fixes become daemon vanquishments and new features become spell discoveries. The lorefiles represent the core implementation of the 'every bash command became a spell' philosophy.
summary: The 27M collection of narrative files forming the heart of agent memory
